greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients of polynomials ( (1 -x +sqrt(x))^n + (1 -x -sqrt(x))^n )/2.
comment: The row polynomial pFe(k+1, x) = Sum_{j=0..k+1} T(k+1, j)*x^j is the numerator of the g.f. for the k-th column sequence of A060920, the even part of the bisected Fibonacci triangle.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..50 of the triangle, flattened
formula: T(n, k) = coefficients of x^k of ((1-x+sqrt(x))^n + (1-x-sqrt(x))^n)/2.
T(n, k) = Sum_{j=0..k} (-1)^(k-j)*binomial(n, 2*j)*binomial(n-2*j, k-j), if 0 <= k <= floor(n/2) and T(n, k) = (-1)^n*T(n, n-k) if floor(n/2) < k <= n, otherwise 0.
program: def A061176(n,k): return sum((-1)^(k+j)*binomial(n,2*j)*binomial(n-2*j,k-j) for j in (0..k))
flatten([[A061176(n,k) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..15)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 06 2021
xref: Cf. A059841, A060920, A061177 (companion triangle), A180957.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 20 2001
